title: New typeface
content:
I'm working on my first text typeface. Here are the letters I've got so far. I'm sort of working in a vacuum, so any constructive criticism would be very welcome. Thanks.

PDF 1 of malpha
malpha.pdf (11.8 k)
author: mal

comments.content:
the contrast is inconsistent, for example "u" and "b". personally i would finish lowercase before working on the caps, and generally i think it would profit when you gave it more uniqueness.   
   
and welcome to typophile!
